attributes.action: look at bringing the changing of phone suppliers in line with Gas and Electricity suppliers.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: I recently made the change to a landline and internet supplier who have turned out to be a nightmare.  I have found the only way to change is to resubscribe to BT before I get internet access again and their minimum contract is now 18 months.  Why am I able to change my other utilities as often as I like but am bound by having to return to BT which is not my choice.  Please can you look at this anomaly...........
